mapper.select: select comment_id , upper_comment_id , post_id , user_id , comments , to_char(created_at, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') created_at from comments where comment_id = #{commentId} and is_deleted = UPPER('N')

select c.comment_id , c.upper_comment_id , c.post_id , c.user_id , c.comments , c.created_at , u.nickname AS "nickname" from comments c INNER JOIN users u ON c.user_id = u.user_id where c.post_id = #{postId} and c.is_deleted = UPPER('N') order by created_at ASC
